mapper.select:
SELECT b.BRANCH_NO, b.BRANCH_NAME, b.BRANCH_REGION, b.BRANCH_TEL, b.BRANCH_DESCRIPTION, b.EMP_NO, e.EMP_NAME, e.EMP_PHONE FROM BRANCH b LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE e ON b.EMP_NO = e.EMP_NO
WHERE b.BRANCH_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY b.BRANCH_NO ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BRANCH ( BRANCH_NO, BRANCH_NAME, BRANCH_REGION, BRANCH_TEL, BRANCH_DESCRIPTION, EMP_NO ) VALUES ( BRANCH_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{branchName}, #{branchRegion}, #{branchTel}, #{branchDescription}, #{empNo} )
mapper.update: UPDATE BRANCH SET BRANCH_NAME = #{branchName}, BRANCH_REGION = #{branchRegion}, BRANCH_TEL = #{branchTel}, BRANCH_DESCRIPTION = #{branchDescription}, EMP_NO = #{empNo} WHERE BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo}
